name: Pong (itch) (Mikadoe)
description:
A simple arcade pong game which includes 2 different gamemodes.

In Infinite Mode you try to hit the ball off a wall for as long as possible. You can also compete against 3 difficulties of AI!

Earn coins in game to buy cool new color schemes!

This is the first game I've ever made so a comment would be appreciated :)
